label: Positive
description: Affirmation that the response or behavior was helpful or correct.

label: Negative
description: Indication that the response was unhelpful, incorrect, or unsatisfying.

label: Suggestion
description: Proposed improvement or alternative to the agent's output.

label: Correction
description: Direct amendment to a factual or interpretive error.

label: Neutral
description: Feedback provided without positive or negative judgment.
